title: Ron's Gone Wrong
description: Set in a future where walking, speaking, digitally connected "B-bots" became kids' friends, Barney is a socially awkward middle-schooler (Jack Dylan Grazer) who finds out that his new B-bot Ron (Zach Galifianakis) never quite works. While on their journey, Barney tries to impress Savannah (Kylie Cantrall) whom he likes.

imdbInfo.ratingReason: Rated PG for some rude material, thematic elements and language

properties.productionCompany: 20th Century Studios / Locksmith Animation / TSG Entertainment
